name: Solar System 2021
description:
This is my Solar System project, part of the Game Design and Development course in Coursera.

Modifications :

-  Included 6 new planets => Mercury, Venus, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn and Uranus.

-  Assigned proportional sizes based on each actual planet's radius.

-  Assigned fewer radians/s to each new planet I added, so that they did not rotate in a straight line. 

Created by : Salvador Torres Rodríguez
